sentences.en: Daytime sleepiness appears to be the new normal for adolescents.
sentences.cn: 白天睡觉似乎在青少年中成为了一种新的睡眠形式.

sentences.en: Eating lots of food drink at holidays are probably the real cause of sleepiness.
sentences.cn: 在节日里暴饮暴食才可能是犯困的真正原因.

sentences.en: He tried to fight the sleepiness that overwhelmed him.
sentences.cn: 他努力地和阵阵袭来的倦意斗争着。

sentences.en: He went out to walk off his sleepiness.
sentences.cn: 他出去走走以驱赶睡意.

sentences.en: If there is excessive daytime sleepiness and desire to nap, in spite of adequate sleep time, this might suggest a sleep disorder warranting further evaluation.
sentences.cn: 如果白天有很强的睡意，想小睡一会，虽然有充足的睡眠时间，这也许意味着睡眠障碍需要进一步评估。

sentences.en: In an instant, sleepiness was all gone.
sentences.cn: 我的天哪,睡意全没了,她问那是什麽啊!

sentences.en: In hex sleepiness her head sank gently against him.
sentences.cn: 在朦胧的睡意中,她的头垂下来,轻轻地靠到了他的身上.

sentences.en: It was caused by lack of sleepiness or tiredness.
sentences.cn: 这是因为睡眠不足或是过于疲劳造成的.

sentences.en: Sleep apnea signs are snoring and daytime sleepiness.
sentences.cn: 睡眠窒息症状是打鼾和白天嗜睡.
困倦导致许多交通事故的发生.

sentences.en: Symptoms can range from insomnia sleepiness, weight issues, food cravings, and even body temperature control.
sentences.cn: 症状包括失眠 、 体重问题 、 饥饿感甚至体温异常.

sentences.en: The manifestation of sleeping disturbance mainly includes insomnia, hypersomnia and excessive daytime sleepiness.
sentences.cn: 脑卒中后睡眠障碍临床表现形式主要有失眠 、 过度睡眠、日间过度倦睡症.

sentences.en: The obvious solution to combat sleepiness is abundance rest at night.
sentences.cn: 克服困倦显而易见的解决之道根本那是保证夜间的睡眠.

sentences.en: These interruptions can lead to daytime sleepiness.
sentences.cn: 这种干扰可导致日间瞌睡.

sentences.en: They also reported less sleepiness and were better at logical reasoning.
sentences.cn: 报告还称,睡午觉的人不爱犯困,而且在逻辑推理方面更出色.

words.tran_cn: 欲睡的；困乏的；不活跃的
